phrases: Yup, the Battle of Fairy Tail has been decided!
And everyone lived happily ever after!
But Laxus ended up being expelled...
This are not sittin' right with me!
Speaking of which, you sure have bad luck with guys, Lucy.
We were not speaking about that!
Why are you bringing that up now?
It is been one week since the Harvest Festival ended.
The city is finally back to its usual, calm self.
It is true that everyone was quite shocked when Laxus was expelled...
Natsu was whining about it like a little kid until yesterday.
Why did you throw Laxus out?
The Day of the Fateful Encounter!
He is part of our family, you know?
Fightin's just part of being a family, right?
I want to fight him again!
Next time I will be strong enough to win against him face to face!
Do you think he expelled Laxus because he wanted to?
It is because it turned out Laxus was a Dragon Slayer like Natsu.
He is not a Dragon Slayer.
We were all really surprised when we heard that.
Laxus was frail when he was a child,
embedded a lacrima that let us you use Dragon Slayer Magic in his body.
Master said that he would take responsibility for his grandson's actions and step down from being the master.
Everyone tried to convince him to stay, but...
Do not make Laxus's punishment any worse, please.
If Laxus found out that you quit, Master...
With a haircut signifying his repentance,
and an air of the past, it was Freed that managed to talk him out of it.
Speaking of Freed, he and the other Raijin Tribe finally opened up a little bit to everyone, I think.
Go ahead and use me as your model, I do not mind!
Do not go thinking anything strange now.
I do not mean nude, okay?
Or how do you like this?
Are you and Loke going out?
And, as usual, I am mixed up with a bunch of weirdos.
Ever since the end of the Harvest Festival, I saw Erza being alone a lot.
To think he would have the same face as someone you know...
I do not really know much about him.
He is quite the tight lipped one, he is.
So, things went like that for about a week...
But I had another big problem left!
Well, that would be nice and all...
I wish I had a boyfriend...
What is with you all of a sudden?
Go without a boyfriend for a while and I start gettin' the itch, you know?
What are you all embarrassed for?
How many guys have you gone out with?
Have not you ever wanted a boyfriend?
But honestly, I do not really know...
Today you will have a fateful encounter.
Erza, what is with the dress?
The Harvest Festival is over already, so...
A reporter for the Weekly Sorcerer is coming to do an interview here.
The Weekly Sorcerer is published every Wednesday!
With features on new magic and all the hot guilds,
plus photo spreads of beautiful female wizards,
it is the magazine about magic!
He said he was writing a special feature on Fairy Tail.
My cuteness will knock him right out.
Please, allow me to photograph your cute smile...
Finally, I will be in a photo spread!
And that reporter is my fateful encounter!
Ms. Lucy, I want to continue this interview... forever.
If I can get a fee from doing the interview,
I might be able to pay my rent!
This is like killing two birds with one stone!
Maybe she ate something that went bad.
Or maybe she is snapped under the pressure of having to pay her rent.
It is not to your taste-ebi?
Maybe something a bit more cutting edge?
Basically, you do not like it-ebi.
I will go on a journey to train-ebi...
How about I go to a bookstore and buy a hairstyle and makeup magazine?
Then I will ask you again!
If I pick a book this way we will end up touching the same book...
So where is the development I have been promised, huh?
I cannot believe my fateful encounter would be with someone out of the blue like that!
I cannot go using up my luck in a place like this!
Do you live in this city?
I am writing a novel while traveling around.
I use all the things I see in the cities I visit as sources for my novel.
All those memories will make that pen fly!
Wait, are you also a writer?
I will give it to you as a present.
Would you take me around for a day?
This cannot be my fateful encounter...
I forgot to go buy the magazine...
And came here instead of going back home...
It is Erza herself, right here before me!
That is Mr. Jason, from the Weekly Sorcerer.
Is not this just the way I usually am?
And after I went and got all dressed up...
I want to capture you as you are naturally!
Anyway, no way I am going to let my chance at getting a photo spread slip by!
Erza there is my friend, see!
Would you answer a few questions?
How many different requips are there you can do?
I cannot do without cheesecake or souffle.
Nobody knows who the heck I am!
I do not want to hear you laughing about it!
He is totally not my type.
What will I do if this is my fateful encounter?
Gray is here, in the flesh!
Gray, why do you take off your clothes so quickly?
It is kind of hot in here...
I might have to strip down myself...
You are the one I wanted to meet most of all!
You are always writin' nasty things about me!
Like about the stuff I destroyed, or the stuff I destroyed, or the stuff I destroyed...
This is radical, to the max!
Whoa, he is just too cool...
I have never seen such a cool handshake before.
Elfman, what is being a man to you?
Team Shadow Gear, is it true you are in a love triangle?
Cana, do a photo shoot this time, okay?
Have a seat and drink up!
I do not care how desperate I am, this are not happening.
Master, what are your aspirations for the guild?
To be devoted every day in our hearts to love and justice!
The Raijin Tribe has been dissolved?
We will work hard to make up for Laxus!
I am aiming to win the next Miss Fairy Tail Contest!
I have not heard from you two in a while!
Go easy on us, got it?
He is not paying any attention to me at all!
It is embarrassing, but it is my only option!
I am a cute li'l bunny!
I will be the one to sing!
In this world, where you look like a fool for doing what is right...
You always looked like a fool, you know?
In other words, it is right to be a fool.
This is a song from my soul...
It is like lightning up my spine that never stops!
Enough with you singin' your crappy songs!
I have not sung anything yet!
Let me sing, you bastard Salamander!
We are in the middle of an interview.
It is a super battle between two Dragon Slayers unfolding before my very eyes!
The photo spread for this issue is going to be a detailed analysis of it, definitely!
I will show you around town, as a fellow author.
Well, it is not really a novel yet.
What are you making such a freaky face for?
It is the same face I always have!
Let us go on a job!
We have to get to the client's house by tomorrow morning,
so we will take a night train.
But you are always complaining you do not have any money.
Would you like to get something to eat tonight around 9?
I would like to talk with you some more.
You do not have to be that depressed!
they were all excited about going on a job with you, Lucy.
They said they found a job that would be perfect for you, although it is not much.
I guess Lucy really is not coming...
I knew she would not show...
I thought you had a date?
Anyway, what is this cheap job that is perfect for me?
It is 70,000 jewel, exactly your rent!
This could last you for three months!
Natsu, it will last one month.
Do not you know what exactly means?
Without your house, where will we weight train?
What is that supposed to mean?
In the end, what is most important to me are my friends at Fairy Tail.
I guess he was not my fated person after all...
It is only a little bit further.
Today you will have a fateful encounter...
Juvia's acting weird, do not you think?
I think everyone else in the guild is being strange.
It is just the usual fighting, right?
I have got a sense that there is something different about it.
Anyway, let us mix it up ourselves!
Are you even listening to me?
Watch out for the guy you like!
I will take on Lucy first!
She seems to be avoiding you...
